scenario_text.value:
*huff* *huff*...
What’s with these guys?!

Ugh... These guys are tough...
Dammit...!

If we go down here, those little creatures
will be in danger, and our friends with them.
We can’t let another friend get hurt!

We’ll never lose another friend... I won’t
let that happen!!!
Right, Agumon?!

Yeah... Nngh... You’re right, Takuma. We
can’t afford to lose! No matter what!

Together...the strength of our feelings will
resonate and... Haaaugh!

Wh-what is this...?!
My body...my body is...!
AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!
Agumon?!

Something’s...strange, Takuma!
Like my heart is pounding...

It hurts... Haaaugh!
But...
This feeling, it...excites me somehow!
Takuma’s feelings must be flowing into me...!
Wait, is this...evolution?!

Ah, ahhh, AAAHHHHHHHHH!!!
I can’t...
Arrrgh!
Agumon, warp evolve to...

*huff*...*huff*...*huff*...!
Heh heh... Ahhhhahaha...!
Agumon... That form...?

...Sorry for the wait, Takuma.
It’s time for my counterattack.
Check out Machinedramon in action!
Dinorexmon!!!

*huff*... *huff*... *whew*
I thought I was gonna die!

You evolved in response to my desire to
protect them?

Yeah, I’m ready to go! This form is up to the
task!

C’mon, let’s do this! I’ll protect anything
and anyone you want me to, Takuma!
